title: Ritual Axe
content:
damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Though shiny and recently polished, dried blood still fills the deepest crevices of this axe.

Ritual Axe Location & Where to Find

Location: on the table near Abdirak (Shattered Sanctum)
